      • setAutoSelectFloor

        public void setAutoSelectFloor(boolean enabled)
        If true, automatically switches the floor being displayed as the user changes floor. This is highly recommended.

      • setFloor

        public void setFloor(int floor)

      • onError

        public void onError(IndoorsException arg0)
        Description copied from interface: IndoorsServiceCallback
        Exceptions from this method will always have an error code set ( IndoorsException.getErrorCode()).
        • ErrorCode.AUTH_LICENSE_EXCEEDED The license key is expired.
        • ErrorCode.AUTH_LICENSE_NOTEXISTING The license key does not exist.
        • ErrorCode.AUTH_OBLIGATORY_IO_REQUEST The license key must be checked with the indoors server, so a connection to the server is required. This is only required if the license was never checked.
        Specified by:
        onError in interface IndoorsServiceCallback
        Specified by:
        onError in interface IndoorsError

      • connected

        public void connected()
        Description copied from interface: IndoorsServiceCallback
        Client successful registered to the indoors service and is free to register IndoorsLocationListeners or make any calls to Indoors.
        Specified by:
        connected in interface IndoorsServiceCallback

      • getRootLayout

        public android.widget.FrameLayout getRootLayout()

      • getIndoors

        public Indoors getIndoors()
        Returns:
        the Indoors object used by this class for interacting with the localization process. Use with caution for advanced operations.

      • getIndoorsSurface

        @Deprecated
public IndoorsSurface getIndoorsSurface()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        the IndoorsSurface object used by this class for displaying the map. You shouldn't access this object in most circumstances.

      • getSurfaceState

        @Deprecated
public SurfaceState getSurfaceState()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns:
        the SurfaceState for the IndoorsSurface currently in use. Use with extreme caution for changing the display of the map.
